events.name: Docker Singapore - Portainer spotlight
events.description: Due to a rare opportunity of having the co-founder and lead engineer at Portainer.io in Singapore. Meetup confirmed - thanks Honestbee for hosting. https://camo.githubusercontent.com/c57e3786d84c99f21e453c6500d8e0333a2cf6d9/68747470733a2f2f706f727461696e65722e696f2f696d616765732f6c6f676f5f616c742e706e67 1st talk: Portainer gives you access to a central overview of your Docker host or Swarm cluster. From the dashboard, you can easily access any manageable entity.By @tony_lapena 2nd talk: A quick look at LinuxKit and building customized Linux distros.By @vincentdesmet
events.location: Honestbee, #04-01B Delta House, 2 Alexandra Road, 159919, Singapore
